          <title>
            <string language="en">Structural formulae of noradrenaline and amphetamine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strukturelle Formeln des Noradrenalins und des 
Benzedrins</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formules structurales de noradrénaline et 
d'amphétamine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fórmulas estruturais do noradrenaline e do 
amphetamine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formule strutturali di noradrenalina e 
dell'anfetamina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δομικοί τύποι noradrenaline και της αμφεταμίνης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fórmulas estructurales del noradrenaline y de la 
anfetamina</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the structural formulae of two stimulants that prepare animals for rapid response: noradrenaline and amphetamine.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amphetamine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Animals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">medicine</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">Neurotransmitter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Noradrenaline</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">response</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stimulants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">structural formula</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die strukturellen Formeln 
von zwei Reizmitteln, die Tiere für schnelle Antwort vorbereiten: 
Noradrenalin und Benzedrin.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les formules 
structurales de deux stimulants qui préparent des animaux pour la 
réponse rapide : noradrénaline et amphétamine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as fórmulas estruturais
de dois stimulants que preparam animais para a resposta rápida: 
noradrenaline e amphetamine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le formule 
strutturali di due stimolanti che preparano gli animali per la 
risposta veloce: noradrenalina ed anfetamina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει δομικούς τύπους δύο 
τονωτικών που προετοιμάζουν τα ζώα για τη γρήγορη απάντηση: 
noradrenaline και αμφεταμίνη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los fórmulas 
estructurales de dos estimulantes que preparen los animales para la 
respuesta rápida: noradrenaline y anfetamina.</string>
          </description>
